title: Epic: 2026-02-26--pm-big-feature-multi-prd-ralph-queue (docs/prd/2026-02-26--pm-big-feature-multi-prd-ralph-queue.md)
description: Implement big-feature PM mode with dual planning strategies, multi-PRD queue preparation, and Ralph-compatible execution readiness. DoD: all PRD acceptance criteria mapped to child tasks with dependencies.

comments.author: d
comments.text: All child tasks (w94.1-w94.9) are complete. Big-feature route now has dual planning modes, queue manifest/idempotency, runnable gate enforcement, async enqueue policy (cap=2, single retry), reconciliation reporting, Codex+Claude MCP policy alignment, and smoke evidence in docs/smoke/2026-02-26-big-feature-planning-modes.md.

title: Add big-feature command routing and mode selection
description: Implement explicit big-feature command routing while keeping the default single-PRD command path unchanged. DoD: mode selector supports conflict-aware and worktree-isolated paths.

comments.author: d
comments.text: Implemented command routing and mode selector rules in pm skill, workflow policy, and README/docs. Default route remains  plan:, big-feature route is explicit  plan big feature:.

title: Implement conflict-aware PRD decomposition constraints
description: Add discovery outputs that minimize cross-PRD conflicts (file ownership, dependency boundaries, touch constraints). DoD: each PRD carries explicit anti-conflict constraints.

comments.author: d
comments.text: Added conflict-aware decomposition requirements to discovery and PRD creation handoff. Big-feature conflict-aware mode now requires explicit per-PRD ownership/file/dependency boundaries and overlap handling.

title: Implement worktree-isolated PRD planning mode
description: Assign isolated worktree execution context per PRD using Ralph-native worktree behavior. DoD: worktree lifecycle and assignment are deterministic and conflict-safe.

comments.author: d
comments.text: Implemented worktree-isolated planning guidance across discovery, beads planning, implementation, and README. Mode now requires explicit per-PRD worktree boundaries and Ralph-native worktree assumptions.

title: Persist queue manifest and idempotent PRD lifecycle state
description: Store per-PRD queue state with approval versioning and idempotency keys. DoD: duplicate runnable entries are prevented by design.

comments.author: d
comments.text: Added queue manifest contract: docs/prd/_queue/<feature-slug>.json, explicit lifecycle states, idempotency key <prd_slug>:<approval_version>, duplicate-entry prevention, retry policy, and canonical schema in docs/QUEUE_WORKFLOW.md. Created docs/prd/_queue/.gitkeep.

title: Enforce runnable promotion gate after PRD and Beads approval
description: Ensure queue promotion happens only after both exact approved gates succeed and Open Questions are empty. DoD: gate violations are blocked with explicit status.

comments.author: d
comments.text: Implemented runnable promotion gate semantics across instructions/pm_workflow.md, skills/pm/SKILL.md, and skills/pm-beads-plan/SKILL.md. Promotion now requires both exact approvals plus empty Open Questions; violations remain blocked with explicit state/reason.

title: Implement async enqueue worker with bounded concurrency
description: Build async queue preparation with worker cap 2 and single automatic retry policy. DoD: failed second attempt transitions to manual intervention state.

comments.author: d
comments.text: Documented async enqueue worker contract with bounded concurrency worker_cap=2, deterministic selection, idempotent attempts, and single auto-retry then queue_failed/manual intervention in instructions/pm_workflow.md, skills/pm/SKILL.md, docs/QUEUE_WORKFLOW.md, and implementation rules.

title: Add queue-ready validation and reconciliation reporting
description: Define queue-ready as enqueued plus selectable plus doctor preflight pass, then produce final reconciliation output. DoD: report includes discovered, approved, queued, and failed counts by PRD.

comments.author: d
comments.text: Added queue-ready and reconciliation reporting contract: queue-ready requires queued+selectable+doctor_pass; reconciliation outputs per-PRD status and aggregate discovered/approved/queued/queue_failed counts in docs/QUEUE_WORKFLOW.md and workflow/implement specs.

title: Align workflow and skill policies for Codex plus Claude MCP
description: Resolve policy drift so PM workflow is codex-compatible and external Claude agents run via claude-code MCP contract. DoD: workflow and skill docs are consistent and non-contradictory.

comments.author: d
comments.text: Resolved Codex/Claude policy drift. Model routing is now Codex-first in instructions/pm_workflow.md; external Claude usage is explicitly limited to claude-code MCP contract; direct Claude CLI/app orchestration is disallowed. Updated README and PM skill wording for consistency.

title: Add smoke-test coverage for dual planning modes
description: Define and run happy/unhappy/regression smoke tests for conflict-aware and worktree-isolated flows. DoD: documented pass/fail evidence and regression checklist.

comments.author: d
comments.text: Added dual-mode smoke coverage requirements and evidence: discovery/prd/beads/implement specs now require conflict-aware + worktree-isolated smoke/regression coverage; created docs/smoke/2026-02-26-big-feature-planning-modes.md with 9 executed checks, pass/fail evidence, and regression checklist (all passed).
